newsitem.title: GERMANY: Siemens in Korean power station deal.
newsitem.headline: Siemens in Korean power station deal.

text.p: German electronics group Siemens AG on Friday said it signed a deal with South Korea's Korea Heavy Industries & Construction (Hanjung) for it to supply Siemens' Teleperm power station control system.
The digitally-based Teleperm system operates with either oil, gas or coal-fired power stations.
The two are already working together to build eight 500 megawatt power station units in South Korea.
